oneOnOne.title: 1-to-1 Chat
oneOnOne.description: A new chatroom will be created with each unique click on the PinChat link, and the unique user can start a 1-to-1 chat with the link owner. This is best used in scenarios such as business inquiries and customer services.

groupChat.title: Group Chat
groupChat.description: With each unique click on the PinChat link, all users will enter the same chatroom, and start a group chat with the link owner. Also, those who entered the chatroom later will be able to see messages sent earlier.

richMessages.title: Send All Kinds of Messages

messageActions.title: Multiple Message Actions

cta.title: Ready to Accelerate Your Client Relations?

hero.title: Build High-Efficiency Customer Service with AI
hero.subtitle: Full human customer service is hard to scale, while pure AI struggles to cover all scenarios. PinChat combines AI responses with human handoff in a hybrid customer service workflow, balancing efficiency, quality, and flexibility to help businesses quickly improve overall service experience.

items.repetitive: Repetitive questions consume significant time, making it difficult for teams to maintain efficiency.
items.scalability: Full human customer service cannot scale, while pure AI solutions struggle to handle complex needs.
items.fragmentation: Messages across multiple platforms are fragmented, making it difficult to integrate customer service workflows consistently.
items.scatteredInfo: Website and document information is scattered and cannot be directly applied to automation.

howPinChatHelps.title: How PinChat Helps
howPinChatHelps.description: PinChat addresses the four major challenges of customer service automation—scattered information, inconsistent responses, excessive human workload, and cross-platform integration difficulties—through a hybrid customer service workflow: 'Data Consolidation → AI Responses → Human Handoff → Multi-Platform Integration'.

consolidateInfo.title: Consolidate Scattered Website and Document Information
consolidateInfo.description: Support importing content from websites, uploading PDF/Word/CSV files, or manually adding Q&A pairs, consolidating originally scattered information into a unified source that AI can use, ensuring consistent and controllable responses.

aiHandling.title: Handle Large Volumes of Repetitive Questions with AI
aiHandling.description: AI can respond to common questions 24/7, quickly handling large volumes of repetitive inquiries. When judgment or more complex scenarios are needed, human customer service can immediately take over, balancing efficiency and quality, avoiding the experience gap caused by excessive pure human workload or pure AI limitations.

unifiedInbox.title: Integrate All Customer Service Channels into a Single Inbox
unifiedInbox.description: Centralize LINE, Messenger, WhatsApp, Instagram, and website conversations for management, avoiding the need for customer service to switch between platforms. Both AI responses and human handoff can operate under a unified workflow, improving overall support efficiency.

benefits.title: Benefits of Using PinChat
benefits.description: The hybrid customer service model allows businesses to achieve the best balance between efficiency, quality, and cost while improving overall customer experience.

reduceCosts.title: Reduce Labor Costs and Workload
reduceCosts.description: AI handles repetitive questions, allowing customer service staff to focus on more important customer communication.

consistentQuality.title: Maintain Consistent and Accurate Response Quality
consistentQuality.description: Response content is based on consolidated data sources from the business, avoiding discrepancies due to staff turnover.

satisfaction.title: Improve Customer Satisfaction
satisfaction.description: Faster responses and smoother experiences enable customers to receive better service at every touchpoint.

aiPinBot.title: AI PinBot
aiPinBot.description: Intelligently responds to common questions, supports multi-language detection and human handoff, serving as the core capability for customer service automation.

chatroomManagement.title: Chatroom Management
chatroomManagement.description: Effectively organize conversations with tags and folders, making human handoff faster and collaboration smoother.

multichannelInbox.title: Multichannel Inbox
multichannelInbox.description: Integrates LINE, Messenger, WhatsApp, Instagram, and Web messages, unifying management of cross-platform customer service needs.

leadCapture.title: Lead Capture Surveys
leadCapture.description: Collect potential customer information through conversational surveys, improving conversion efficiency.

feedbackCollection.title: Feedback Collection
feedbackCollection.description: Organize survey and conversation responses to help teams quickly identify common issues and service bottlenecks.

workflowManagement.title: Workflow Management
workflowManagement.description: Organize conversations with tags and folders, making customer service collaboration workflows clearer and more efficient.

cta.title: Start Your Customer Service Automation Process Now

hero.title: Centralize All Cross-Platform Messages
hero.subtitle: Scattered multichannel messages make tracking difficult and responses delayed. PinChat consolidates all conversations into a single interface, helping teams respond faster, maintain consistent service quality, and significantly improve customer service efficiency and customer experience.

items.dispersed: Messages come from diverse and scattered sources
items.context: Conversation context is difficult to fully grasp
items.consistency: Service quality is hard to maintain consistently

howPinChatHelps.title: Integrate All Messages in One Interface
howPinChatHelps.description: PinChat centralizes all messages from social media and websites, effectively organizing conversations through tags, folders, and search functions. Smart replies can handle common questions, allowing customer service to focus on interactions that require human communication.

integrateAll.title: Integrate All Social Media and Website Messages
integrateAll.description: Centralize all social media and website conversations into a unified inbox, enabling customer service to quickly view and process messages, reducing the burden of cross-platform switching and making overall workflows smoother.

improveEfficiency.title: Improve Customer Service Response Efficiency with Tools
improveEfficiency.description: Use tags, folders, and search functions to organize large volumes of conversations, enabling teams to quickly find important messages and respond more efficiently, reducing delays and missed risks.

smartReply.title: Seamless Collaboration Between Smart Replies and Human Agents
smartReply.description: Smart replies can handle common questions and seamlessly switch to human assistance when needed, reducing team workload while maintaining clear and consistent customer responses.

benefits.title: Comprehensively Improve Customer Service Efficiency and Quality
benefits.description: Unified message management reduces processing time, lowers error risks, and helps teams maintain consistent service quality across all channels, making customer experience smoother and significantly improving response speed.

reduceGaps.title: Reduce Communication Gaps and Preserve Context
reduceGaps.description: All historical messages and context are fully preserved, enabling different team members to quickly understand customer status and take over seamlessly, reducing repeated inquiries and information gaps.

reduceTime.title: Significantly Reduce Message Processing Time
reduceTime.description: View all messages through a single interface, reducing interruptions from cross-platform switching, enabling customer service to focus on processing large volumes of messages and accelerating overall response speed.

consistentBrand.title: Maintain Consistent and Professional Brand Experience
consistentBrand.description: Regardless of which channel customers contact from, they receive the same quality responses and service, helping businesses maintain a more unified and trustworthy brand experience.

aiBot.title: AI Customer Service Bot
aiBot.description: Automatically reply to common questions to reduce customer service workload, and seamlessly switch to human assistance when needed, making the overall customer service process smoother.

websiteChat.title: Website Live Chat Tool
websiteChat.description: Enable website visitors to start conversations instantly, increasing inquiry volume and interaction rates, while centralizing all messages back to the same interface for management.

chatroomManagement.title: Chatroom Management
chatroomManagement.description: Effectively organize messages using tags, folders, and search functions, enabling teams to quickly find important conversations and improve overall processing efficiency.

customerAutomation.title: Customer Service Automation
customerAutomation.description: Smart replies can handle large volumes of common questions, reducing manual workload while retaining the flexibility for human agents to take over instantly, improving overall customer service efficiency.

leadCapture.title: Lead Generation and Information Collection
leadCapture.description: Collect customer information through conversational surveys, making responses more natural, improving data quality, and enabling instant conversion to follow-up actions.

teamCollaboration.title: Team Communication and Division of Labor
teamCollaboration.description: Assist team division of labor through tags, folders, and permission controls, making customer service processes more organized and comprehensively improving response efficiency.

cta.title: Start Integrating All Customer Service Messages

hero.title: AI-Powered Live Chat, Tailored for Your Brand
hero.subtitle: Connect with customers through intelligent conversations, streamline team communication, and grow your business with our all-in-one messaging solution.

features_section.title: Everything you need to connect with customers
features_section.subtitle: Powerful features designed to help you communicate better and grow faster

items.quickConnectDesc: Let customers reach you anywhere with a simple PinChat link or QR code — and manage chats from LINE, Messenger, or WhatsApp all in one place.
items.aiChatbotDesc: Automate replies to common questions 24/7, with smooth handoff to human agents whenever needed.
items.unifiedInboxDesc: View and reply to all customer messages across multiple channels in one organized inbox.
items.noCodeSetupDesc: Get started in minutes with an easy-to-use platform — no technical skills required.
items.customizationBrandingDesc: Customize your chat appearance and domain settings to deliver a branded customer experience.
items.clientListDesc: Turn every chat into a customer profile you can organize, manage, and export for follow-up.

footer.description: Instant messaging and AI chatbot platform for modern businesses.

common.quickSearchDescription: Quick search and filter for specific conversations
common.faqBotMobileAlt: FAQ bot mobile interface with automated responses

homepage.valueBlock1Desc: With a simple QR code or short link, customers can instantly start a conversation without extra downloads or sign-ups—reducing wait times and boosting conversions.
homepage.valueBlock2Desc: Unify conversations from LINE, Instagram, Messenger, and WhatsApp into PinChat. Your support team can manage all messages in one place and keep full context.
homepage.valueBlock3Desc: Just paste your website link to automatically generate an AI PinBot that handles FAQs, while allowing human agents to step in anytime.
homepage.valueBlock4Desc: Support for sub-accounts, chatroom folders, and tag management—making it easy to delegate tasks, track conversations, and organize customer data without chaos.

hero.title: Sell smarter with AI-powered customer chat
hero.subtitle: From online stores to retail counters, PinChat helps your team connect instantly with shoppers, automate FAQs, and boost sales with personalized AI conversations.

whyUse.title: Why Retail & E-commerce teams use PinChat

items.engage: Engage customers from browsing to post-purchase with personalized chat experiences.
items.instantAnswers: Answer FAQs instantly with AI-powered responses.
items.orderUpdates: Keep customers informed about their order status through automated messages.
items.campaigns: Automate campaign replies and track performance effortlessly.

planEngagement.title: Plan your customer engagement
planEngagement.description: Make better customer service decisions by increasing team transparency and delivering consistent communication — whether it's product questions, order updates, or support requests.

alignTeam.title: Align your team
alignTeam.description: Keep your team in sync as you handle inquiries, review customer needs, and align on your service strategy.

respondFaster.title: Respond faster
respondFaster.description: Determine what questions are priority and what can be handled by AI assistants, responding via instant messaging.

diveDetails.title: Dive into the details
diveDetails.description: Share product specs, order timelines, and service protocols so everyone knows how you'll serve your customers.

origins.title: PinChat Origins
origins.description: PinChat was born from a simple observation: conversations between businesses and customers were often fragmented and difficult to manage. Our initial idea started as lightweight chatrooms shared via short links or QR codes—making it effortless for merchants and consumers to connect without technical barriers.

2019.title: 2019 – Version 1
2019.description: Completed the first backend version, laying the foundation for PinChat.

2020.title: 2020 – First Customers
2020.description: Continued iterations and improvements, welcoming our very first customers.

2022.title: 2022 – Expansion & Recognition
2022.description: Launched third-party integrations and payment features. Officially listed on AppSumo, gaining international exposure.

2025.title: 2025 – AI PinBot
2025.description: Released AI PinBot, introducing advanced conversational intelligence to empower businesses with smarter customer support.

customPlan.title: Need a custom solution?
customPlan.description: For larger teams or businesses with specific needs, we also offer custom plans with flexible features and dedicated support.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about PinChat pricing and features.
faq.q1: Do you offer a free plan or trial?
faq.a1:
Yes. PinChat offers a Free plan with essential chat features, and all paid plans come with a 7-day free trial. The trial includes our core features such as AI PinBot, chat customization, and survey tools.

Some advanced features like third-party integrations (LINE, WhatsApp, Messenger, Instagram) and custom domains are not included in the trial. You can unlock them once you subscribe to a paid plan.
faq.a2: MAU refers to the number of unique users who interact with your chat service within a calendar month. This includes visitors who send messages, participate in conversations, or engage with your AI PinBot. Each unique user is counted once per month, regardless of how many times they chat.
faq.a3: Plans are billed monthly based on your subscription tier. Each plan includes a fixed number of Monthly Active Users (MAU) and AI PinBot messages. If you need more than what's included, you can upgrade your plan or contact us for custom pricing.
faq.a4: Yes. All subscriptions renew automatically every month unless you cancel before your renewal date.
faq.q5: Can I change my plan later?
faq.a5: Yes. You can switch plans at any time. To upgrade or downgrade, simply cancel your current subscription and subscribe to a new plan. The process only takes a few clicks, and your data will remain intact.
faq.q6: What happens if I exceed my usage limits?
faq.a6: If you exceed your MAU or AI PinBot quota, your service will continue but some features (like AI PinBot replies) may pause until you upgrade your plan or contact us to arrange additional capacity.
faq.q7: What happens to my data if I cancel my subscription?
faq.a7: Your data will remain stored for a limited period after cancellation. You can re-subscribe to regain access.
faq.q8: Do you offer custom enterprise pricing?
faq.a8: Yes. For larger teams or businesses with advanced needs, we provide custom plans with flexible features and dedicated support. Please contact us to learn more.
faq.q9: Can I use my own AI provider key (BYOK)?
faq.a9: Yes. Our Standard plan and above supports BYOK (Bring Your Own Key). Currently, Gemini and OpenAI are supported, and more providers will be added soon.

cta.title: Start for free today
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses already using PinChat to revolutionize their customer communication. No credit card required.

notes.byok: *BYOK = Bring Your Own Key. Currently supports OpenAI, with more AI providers coming soon.
